0x09034479E6E3E269.name: _GET_TRAIN_TRACK_NEXT_JUNCTION_SWITCH
0x09034479E6E3E269.comment: Returns train track and junction index where the train is like trash hash and nearest junction index

examples.code: local trainTrack, junctionIndex = Citizen.InvokeNative(0x09034479E6E3E269, train, Citizen.PointerValueInt(), Citizen.PointerValueInt())
